sections.text: agnEḥ kRuttikAḥ|śukraM̍ parastA-jjyOti-ravastA̱t||prajApa̍tE̍ rOhiṇI|Apaḥ̍ parastAdOṣadhayO̍ &vastA̱t||sOmasyEnvakA̍ vitatAni|parastAdvaya̍ntO̍ &vastA̱t||rudrasya# bAhU|mRugayavaḥ̍ parastA̱dvikṣArO&vastA̱t||adi̍tyai̍ punarvasU|vAta̍ḥ̍ parastAdArdra-mavastA̱t||1̍ (10)

bRuhaspatE̱stiṣyaḥ|juhva̍taḥ̍ parastAd-yajamAnA̍ avastA̱t||sarpAṇA-mAśrEṣAḥ|aByAgacCa̍ntaḥ̍ parastAdaByAnRutya̍ntO&vastA̱t||pitRuṇAM̍ maGAḥ|rudantaḥ̍ parastAdapaBraṃqśO̍&vastA̱t||aryamṇaḥ̍ pUrvE PalgunI|jAyA̍ parastAdRuṣaBO̍&vastA̱t||BagasyOtta̍rE|vahatava̍ḥ̍ parastAdvahamAnA̍ avastA̱t

dEvasya# savituṛ hastaḥ|prasavaḥ̍ parastA̱th-saqniravastA̱t||indrasya̍ citrA|RutaM parastA̱th-satya-mavastA̱t||vAyOr-niṣṭyA̱ vratatiḥ|parastA-dasi̍ddhi-ravastA̱t||indrAgniyOr̍ viśAKE|yugAni̍# parastA̱t-kRuṣamAṇA̍ avastA̱t||mitrasyA-nUrAdhAḥ|aByArOha̍t-parastA̍-daByArU̍ḍha-mavastA̱t||3̍ (10)

indrasya̍ rOhiṇI|śRuṇat-parastA̱t-pratiśRuṇa-davastA̱t||niṛRutyai-mUlavaṛha̍ṇI|pratiBa~jjanta̍ḥ̍ parastA̱t-pratiśRuṇantO&vastA̱t||apAM pUrvA# aṣAḍhAḥ|varcaḥ̍ parastAth-samiti-ravastA̱t||viśvE̍ṣAM̍ dEvAnA-muttarAḥ|aBijaya̍t-parastA̍-daBiji̍ta-mavastA̱t||viṣṇO̱ḥ̍ śrOṇA pRucCamAnAḥ|parastAt-panthA̍# avastA̱t

vasUnAṅq̍ śraviṣṭhAḥ|BUtaM̍ parastAd-BUtiravastA̱t||indra̍sya-śataBi̍ṣak|viśvavya̍cAḥ̍ parastA̱d-viśvakṣiti-ravastA̱t||ajasyaika̍padaḥ̍ pUrvE̱ prOṣṭhapadAḥ|vaiśvAnaraM parastA̱d-vaiśvAvasava-mavastA̱t||ahE̱rbudhniya-syOttarE|aBiṣi~jcanta̍ḥ̍ parastA-daBiṣuṇvantO&vastA̱t||pUṣṇO̍ rEvatI̱|gAvaḥ̍ parastA̱d-vathsA avastA̱t ( )||aśvinOraśvayujau̱|grAma̍ḥ̍ parastAthsEnA &vastA̱t||yamasyApaBara̍ṇIḥ|apakaṛṣa̍ntaḥ̍ parastA-dapavaha̍ntO&vastA̱t||“pUrṇA-paścAd{1}”,̍ “yattE# dEvA adadhuḥ{2}”||5̍ (15) 1.5.2 anuvAkaM 2 - karmAnuṣṭhAnArhaḥ nakṣatrarUpaḥ puṇyakAlaḥ

yat puṇyaM nakṣatram|tad-baṭ̍ kurvItOpavyuṣam|yadA̍ vai sUrya# udEti|atha̍ nakṣatraM̍ naiti|yAva̍ti̍ tatra sUryO gacCE̱t|yatra# jaGanyaM̍ paśyE̱t|tAvati̍ kurvIta yat kArI syAt|puṇyAha Eva kurutE|Evaṃ̍ ha vai yajñEṣuM̍ ca śatadyumnaM̍ ca mAthsyO niravasAyayAM̍ cakAra||6̍ (9)

yO vai nakṣatriya̍M̍ prajApatiM̍ ~MvEda|uBayO̍rEnaM̍ ~MlOkayO̱rviduḥ|hasta# EvAsya hastaḥ|citrA̍ śiraḥ|niṣṭyA̍ hRudayam|UrU̍ viśAKE|pratiṣṭhA̍ &nUrAdhAḥ|Eṣa̍ vai nakṣatriya̍ḥ̍ prajApatiḥ|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|uBayO̍rEnaM̍ ~MlOkayO̱rviduḥ|7 (10)

asmiṅścA-muṣmiṅśca||yAM̍ kAmayEta̍ duhitaraM̍ priyA syAditi|tAM̍ niṣṭyAyAM̍ dadyAt|priyaiva Bavati|nEva̍ tu punarAgacCati||aBijinnAma̍ nakṣatram|upari̍ṣṭA-daṣAḍhAnA̱m|avastA̱cCrOṇAyai̱|dEvAsurAḥ̍ sam~MyattA̍ Asann|tE dEvAstasmin-nakṣatrE&Bya̍jayann|8̍ (10)

yadaByajayann|tada̍BijitO̍&Bijittvam|yaM̍ kAmayEtA-napajayyaM̍ jayEditi̍|tamEtasmin-nakṣa̍trE̍ yAtayEt|anapajayyamEva jayati|pApapa̍rAjitamiva̍ tu||prajApatiḥ̍ paśUnasRujata|tE̍ nakṣatraM̍ nakṣatra-mupAtiṣṭhanta|tE̍ samAvanta̍ EvABavann|tE̍ rEvatI-mupAtiṣṭhanta|9̍ (10)

tE rEvatyAM prABavann|tasmA̱d-rEvatyA̱M̍ paśUnAM kurvIta|yat̍ kiMcA̱rvAcInaṃq sOmA̱t|praiva Bavanti||salilaM̍ ~MvA idamantarAsI̱t|yadata̍rann|tat̍ tArakAṇAM̍ tArakatvam|yO vA iha yajatE|amuṃ̍ salOkaM nakṣatE|tannakṣa̍trAṇAM̍ nakṣatratvam|10 (10)

dEvagRuhA vai nakṣatrAṇi|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|gRuhyE̍va̍ Bavati||yAni̍ vA imAni# pRuthivyAścitrAṇi|tAni̍ nakṣatrAṇi|tasmA̍-daślIlanA̍maṅ-ścitrE|nAva̍syEnna̍ yajEta|yathA̍# pApAhE kurutE|tAdRugEva̍ tat||dEvanakṣatrAṇi vA anyAni|11̍ (10)

yamanakṣatrAṇyanyAni|kRutti̍kAḥ̍ prathamam|viśAKE̍ uttamam|tAni# dEvanakṣatrAṇi|anUrAdhAḥ̍ prathamam|apaBara̍ṇI-ruttamam|tAni̍# yamanakṣatrAṇi|yAni̍# dEvanakṣatrAṇi|tAni̍ dakṣiṇEna̍ pariyanti|yAni̍# yamanakṣatrAṇi|12̍ (10)
tAnyuttarEṇa||anvE̍ṣAmarAthsmEti̍|tada̍nUrAdhAḥ|jyEṣṭhamE̍ṣA-mavadhiṣmEti̍|tajjyE̱ṣṭhaGnI|mUla̍mEṣAmavRukṣAmEti̍|tan-mU̍lavaṛha̍ṇI|yannAsa̍hanta|tada̍ṣAḍhAḥ|yadaślO̍ṇat|13̍ (10)

tacCrOṇA|yadaśRuṇOt|tacCravi̍ṣṭhAḥ|yacCata-maBi̍ṣajyann|tacCataBi̍ṣak|prOṣṭhapadEṣUda̍yacCanta|rEvatyA̍maravanta|aśvayujO̍rayu~jjata|apaBara̍ṇIṣva̍ pAvahann|tAni̍ vA EtAni# yamanakṣatrAṇi# ( )||yAnyEva dEvanakṣatrAṇi̍|tEṣu̍# kurvIta yatkArI syAt|puṇyAha Eva kurutE||14̍ (13) 1.5.3 anuvAkaM 3 - karmAnuṣṭhAnArhaḥ divasaBAgarUpaḥ hEyOpAdEyakAla viBAgaḥ

dEvasya# savituḥ prAtaḥ prasavaḥ̍ prAṇaḥ|varuṇasya̍ sAyamAsavO̍&pAnaḥ||yat̍ pratIcIna̍M̍ prAtastanA̱t|prAcInaṃ# saMgavAt|tatO# dEvA agniṣṭOmaM̍ niramimata|tat-tadAtta̍vIryaM̍ nirmArgaḥ||mitrasya# saMgavaḥ|tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaḥ|tasmAttaṛhi̍# paśavaḥ̍ samAyanti||yat̍ pratIcInaṃ̍# saMgavAt|15 (10)

prAcInaM̍ maddhyandinAt|tatO̍# dEvA ukthyaM̍ niramimata|tat-tadAtta̍vIryaM̍ nirmArgaḥ||bRuhaspatE̱r maddhyandinaḥ|tat-puṇya̍M̍ tEjasvyahaḥ|tasmAttaṛhi̍ tEkṣṇiṣṭhaM̍ tapati||yat-pratIcIna̍M̍ maddhyandinAt|prAcIna̍-maparAhṇAt|tatO̍# dEvAḥ ṣOḍaśinaM̍ niramimata|tattadAtta̍vIryaM̍ nirmArgaḥ

BagasyAparAhṇaḥ|tat-puṇya̍M̍ tEjasvyahaḥ|tasmA̍daparAhṇE̍ kumAryO̍# BagamicCamA̍nA-ścaranti||yat-pra̍tIcIna̍maparAhṇAt|prAcInaṃ̍# sAyAt|tatO# dEvA atirAtraM̍ niramimata|tattadAtta̍vIryaM̍ nirmArgaḥ||varuṇasya̍ sAyam|tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaḥ|tasmAttaṛhi̍ nAnRutaM̍ ~MvadEt

brAhmaṇO vA aṣṭAviṃqśO̍ nakṣatrAṇAm|samAnasyAhnaḥ̍ pa~jca puṇyAni̍ nakṣatrAṇi|catvArya̍ślIlAni̍|tAni̍ nava|yacca̍# parastAnnakṣatrAṇAM̍ ~MyaccAvastA̱t|tAnyEkAdaśa|brAhmaṇO̍ dvAdaśaḥ|ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnth saM~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvrataM carati|saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsya̍# vrataM guptaM Bavati||samAnasyAhnaḥ̍ pa~jca puṇyAni̍ nakṣatrAṇi̍ ( )|catvAryaślIlAni̍|tAni̍ nava|AgnEyI̍ rAtriḥ|aindramaha̍ḥ|tAnyEkA̍daśa|AdityO̍ dvAdaśaḥ|ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnth sam~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvrataM carati|sam~MvathsarEṇaivAsya̍# vrataM guptaM Bavati||18̍ (18) 1.5.4 anuvAkaM 4 - sOmaśEṣaBUtA pAtrastutiḥ.(AdhvarabrAhmaṇaśEṣaḥ)

brahmavAdinO# vadanti|kati pAtrAṇi̍ yajñaM ~MvahantIti̍|trayO̍daśEti̍# brUyAt|sa yadbrUyAt|kastAni niramimItEti̍|prajApa̍tiriti̍# brUyAt|sa yadbrUyAt|kutastAni niramimItEti̍|Atmana̍ iti|prAṇApAnAByA̍-mEvOpAṅ̍-śvantaryAmau̍ niramimIta|19̍ (10)

vyAnAdupAṃśu̍ savanam|vAca̍ ai̱ndravAyavam|dakṣakratuByA̱M maitrAvaruṇam|śrOtrAdAśvinam|cakṣu̍ṣaḥ̍ śukrA manthinau̱|Atmana# Agrayaṇam|a~ggE̱Bya ukthya̱m|AyuṣO̍ dhruvam|pratiṣṭhAyA# RutupAtrE||yajñaM ~MvAva taM prajApatir̍ niramimIta̍ ( )|sa nirmitO̍ nAddhriyata̍ samavlIyata|sa̍ EtAn prajApati-rapivApAna̍-paśyat|tAnnira̍vapat|tairvai̍ sa yajñamapyavapat|yada̍pivApA̍ Bavanti|yajñasya̍ dhRutyA asam~MvlayAya||20̍ (16) (upAṅqśvantaryAmau niramimItA-̍ mimIta ṣaṭ ca)̍ (A4) 1.5.5 anuvAkaM 5 - cAturmAsyaśEṣA vapanamantrAḥ, (rAjasUyabrAhmaṇam)

RutamEva paramEṣṭhi|RutaM̍ nAtyEti̍ kiM cana|RutE samudra̍ Ahitaḥ|RutE̍ BUmiriyaṅ̍ śritA|agnistigmEna# śOciṣA̱|tapa AkrA̱nta-muṣṇihA̱|śirastapasyAhitam|vaiśvAnarasya̍ tEjasA|RutEnA̱sya̍ nivartayE|satyEna̍ parivartayE|21̍ (10)

tapasA&syAnu̍vartayE|śivEnAsyOpa̍vartayE|śagmEnA̱syA-Biva̍rtayE|tadRutaM̍ tath satyam|tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|tEna̍# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam||yad-Garmaḥ paryavartayat|antA̱n̍ pRuthivyA divaḥ|agnirIśAna̍ OjasA|varu̍ṇO̍ dhItiBiḥ̍ saha|22 (10)

indrO# marudBiḥ saKiBiḥ̍ saha||agnistigmEna# śOciṣA̱|tapa AkrA̱nta-muṣṇihA̱|śirastapasyAhitam|vaiśvAnarasya̍ tEjasA|RutEnA̱sya̍ nivartayE|satyEna̍ parivartayE|tapa̍sA̍ &syAnuvartayE|śivEnAsyOpa̍vartayE|śagmEnA̱syABiva̍rtayE|23̍ (10)

tadRutaM tath satyam|tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|tEna̍# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam||yO asyAḥ pRuthivyAstvaci|nivartayatyOṣa̍dhIḥ|agnirIśA̍na̍ OjasA|varu̍ṇO̍ dhItiBiḥ̍ saha|indrO# marudBiḥ saKiBiḥ̍ saha||agnistigmEna# śOciṣA̱|tapa AkrA̱nta-muṣṇihA̱|24 (10)

śirastapasyAhitam|vaiśvAnarasya̍ tEjasA|RutEnA̱sya̍ nivartayE|satyEna̍ parivartayE|tapa̍sA̍ &syAnuvartayE|śivEnAsyOpa̍vartayE|śagmEnA̱syA-Biva̍rtayE|tadRutaM̍ tath satyam|tad-vataM tacCakEyam|tEna̍# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam

EkaM mAsa-mudasRujat|paramEṣṭhI̍ prajAByaḥ|tEnA̱ByO̍ maha Avahat|amRutaM̍ martyA̱Byaḥ|prajAmanu prajAyasE|tadu̍# tE martyAmRuta̱m|yEna mAsA# arddhamAsAḥ|Rutavaḥ̍ parivathsarAḥ|yEna tE tE̱ prajApatE|IjAnasya nyavartayann|26̍ (10)

tEnAhamasya brahmaṇA|niva̍rtayAmi̍ jIvasE̱||agnistigmEna# śOciṣA̱|tapa AkrA̱nta-muṣṇihA̱|śirastapasyAhitam|vaiśvAnarasya̍ tEjasA|RutEnA̱sya̍ nivartayE|satyEna̍ parivartayE|tapa̍sA̍ &syAnuvartayE|śivEnAsyOpa̍vartayE̍ ( )|śagmEnA̱syABivartayE|tadRutaM̍ tath-satyam|tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|tEna̍# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam||27 (14) 1.5.6 anuvAkaM 6 - cAturmAsyaśEṣA vapanavidhi: (rAjasUyabrAhmaṇam)

dEvA vai yad-yajñE &kurvata|tadasu̍rA̍ akurvata|tE&surA̍ UrddhvaM pRuṣṭhEByO nApaśyann|tE̍ kEśAnagrE&vapanta|atha̍ śmaśrUṇi|athO̍papakṣau|tatastE&vA̱~jca̍ Ayann|parA&Bavann|yasyaivaM̍ ~Mvapanti|avA̍~gEti|28̍ (10)

athO paraiva Bavati|atha̍# dEvA UrddhvaM pRuṣṭhEByO&paśyann|ta̍ upapakṣAvagrE̍&vapanta|atha̍ śmaśrUṇi|atha̍ kEśAn|tatastE̍&Bavann|suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyann|yasyaivaM̍ ~Mvapanti|Bava̍tyAtmanA̱|athO̍# suvargaM ~MlOkamEti||29̍ (10)

athaitan-manur-vaptrE̍ mithuna-ma̍paśyat|sa̍ śmaśrUṇyagrE&vapata|athO̍papakṣau|atha̍ kEśAn|tatO̍ vai sa prAjAyata̍ prajayA# paśuBiḥ|yasyaivaM̍ ~Mvapanti|pra̍ prajayA# paśuBir-mithunair̍ jAyatE||dEvAsurAḥ̍ sam~MyattA̍ Asann|tE sam~MvathsarE̍ vyAyacCanta|tAn̍ dEvAścAtur-mAsyairEvABi̍ prAyu~jjata|30̍ (10)

vaiśvadEvEna# caturO# mAsO&vRu~jjatEndra̍rAjAnaḥ|tA~jCIrq.ṣanni̍ cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca|varuṇa praGAsai-ścaturO# mAsO&vRu~jjata̍ varuṇarAjAnaḥ|tA~jCIrq.ṣanni̍ cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca|sAkamEdhaiścaturO# mAsO&vRu~jjata̍ sOmarAjAnaḥ|tA~jCIra.ṣanni̍ cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca|yA sam~Mvathsara̍ upajIvA̍ &&sI̱t|tAmEṣA-mavRu~jjata|tatO̍# dEvA aBavann|parA&su̍rAḥ|31̍ (10)

ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅ-ścAturmAsyair-yaja̍tE|BrAtRu̍vyasyaiva̍ mAsO vRuktvA|śIrq.ṣanni ca# vartayatE̍ pari# ca|yaiṣA sam~Mvathsara̍ upajIvA|vRu~gktE̍ tAM BrAtRuvyasya|kṣudhA̍ &sya BrAtRuvyaḥ̍ parA# Bavati||lOhitAyasEna nivartayatE|yadvA̍ imAmagniṛ RutAvAgatE̍ nivartayati|EtadEvainAṃ̍# rUpaM kRutvA nivartayati|sA̍ tataḥ śvaḥ śvO BUyasI̍ BavantyEti|32̍ (10)

prajAyatE|ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvA~MllOhitAyasEna̍# nivartayatE|EtadEva̍ rUpaM kRutvA nivartayatE|sa̍ tataḥ śvaḥ śvO BUyAn-BavannEti|praiva̍ jAyatE||trEṇyA̍ śalalyA̍ nivartayEta|trIṇi̍# trIṇi vai dEvAnAmRuddhAni̍|trIṇi̍ CandAṃsi|trIṇi̍ savanAni|traya̍# imE lOkAḥ|33 (10)

RuddhyAmEva tad-vIrya# Eṣu lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhati||yaccAturmAsyayA-jyA̱tmanO̍ nAvadyEt|dEvEBya AvRuścyEta|catRuṣu̍ catRuṣu̍ mAsEṣu̍ nivartayEta|parOkṣa̍mEva̍ tad-dEvEBya# AtmanO&vadyatyanA̱̍ vraskAya||dEvAnAM ~MvA Eṣa AnItaḥ|yaścA̍turmAsyayAjI|ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnni ca# vartayatE̍ pari# ca|dEvatA# EvApyEti|nAsya̍# rudraḥ prajAM paśU-naBimanyatE̍ ( )||34 (10) 1.5.7 anuvAkaM 7 - agnicayanaśEṣA iṣṭakOpadhAnamantrAḥ, tatra saMtatyAKyEṣṭakAmantrAḥ

Ayuṣaḥ̍ prAṇaṃ santanu|prAṇAda̍pAnaṃ̍ santanu|apAnAd̍ vyAnaṃ santanu|vyAnAccakṣuḥ̍ santanu|cakṣu̍ṣaḥ̍ śrOtraṃq santanu|śrOtrAn̍ manaḥ santanu|mana̍sO̍ vAcaṃq santanu|vAca̍ AtmAnaṃq santanu|Atmana̍ḥ̍ pRuthivIṃ santanu|pRuthivyA̍ antarikṣaṃq̍ santanu̍ ( )|antarikṣAd-divaṃq̍ santanu|divaḥ̍ suvaḥ santanu||35̍ (12) (antarikṣaṃq̍ santanu̍ dvE ca)̍ (A7) 1.5.8 anuvAkaM 8 - agnicayanaśEṣA tharvaśirO&BidhAnAnAmiṣṭakAnAM mantrAḥ

indrO# dadhIcO asthaBiḥ|vRutrAṇya̍ pratiṣkutaḥ|jaGAna̍# nava tIrnava||icCannaśva̍sya̍ yacCiraḥ|parva̍tEṣvapa̍# śritam|tad-vidacCaryaṇAva̍ti||atrA̍ ha qgOramanvata|nAma̍ tvaṣṭurapIcya̱m|itthA̍ candramasO̍ gRuhE||indramidgAthinO# bRuhat|36 (10)

indramarkEBi̍rarkiṇa̍ḥ|indraM̍ ~MvAṇIranUṣata||indra̍ iddharyOḥ sacA̱|saMmiśla̍ AvacO̍ yujA̱|indrO# vajrI hiraṇyaya̍ḥ||indrO̍# dIrGAya cakṣasE|A̍ sUryaṃ# rOhayad-divi|vi gOBiradrimairayat||indra̍ vAjEṣu̍ nO ava|sahasra# pradhanEṣu ca|37 (10)

ugra ugrABirUtiBi̍ḥ||tamindra̍M̍ ~MvAjayAmasi|mahE vRutrAya hantavE|sa̍ vRuṣA# vRuṣaBO Buvat||indraḥ̍ sadAmanE̍ kRutaḥ|Ojiṣṭhaḥ̍ sa balE# hitaḥ|dyumnI ślOkI sa saumyaḥ||girA̍ vajrO na saMBRutaḥ|saba̍lO̍ anapacyutaḥ|vavakṣu-rugrO̍ astRutaḥ̍ ( )||38 (10) 1.5.9 anuvAkaM 9 - sOmaśEṣaBUtA iṣṭayaḥ. (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

dEvAsurAḥ sam~MyattA̍ Asann|sa prajApatirindra̍M̍ jyEṣṭhaM putramapa nyadhatta|nEdE̍namasu̍rA̍ balIyAṃ̍ sO&hananniti|prahrAdO̍# ha vai kAyAdhavaḥ|virOca̍naṅq̍ svaM putramapa nyadhatta|nEdE̍naM̍ dEvA ahananniti̍|tE̍ dEvAḥ prajApati-mupasamEtyO̍cuḥ|nArAjaka̍sya̍ yuddhamasti|indramanvi̍cCAmEti̍|taM̍ ~MyajñakratuBi-ranvai̱cCann|39̍ (10)

taM ~MyajñakratuBirnAnva̍vindann|tamiṣṭi̍Bi-ranvai̱cCann|tamiṣṭi̍Bi-ranva̍vindann|tadiṣṭI̍nA-miṣṭitvam|Eṣṭa̍yO̍ ha vai nAma|tA̍ iṣṭaya̍ ityAcakṣatE̍ parOkṣEṇa|parOkṣa̍priyA̍ iva hi dEvAḥ||tasmA# EtamA̱gnAvaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ dIkṣaṇIyaM niravapann|tada̍padrutyA̍tanvata|tAnpa̍tnI̍ sam~MyAjAnta upAnayann|40̍ (10)

tE tadaM̍ tamEva kRutvOdadravann||tE̍ prAyaṇIya̍maBi̍ samArOhann|tada̍padrutyA̍tanvata|tA~jCam~Myva̍nta̍ upAnayann|tE̍ tadataMmEva̍ kRutvOdadravann||ta̍ AtithyamaBi̍ samArOhann|tada̍padrutyA̍tanvata|tAniḍA̱nta̍ upAnayann|tE̍ tadataMmEva̍ kRutvOdadravann|tasmA̍# dEtA EtadantA̍ iṣṭayaḥ̍ saMtiṣṭhantE||41(10)̍

Evaṃ hi dEvA akurvata|iti̍# dEvA akurvata|ityu̍ vai manuṣyA̱ḥ̍ kurvatE||tE dEvA Ucuḥ|yadvA̍ idamuccair-yajñEna carAma|tannO&su̍rAḥ̍ pApmA&nuvindanti|upAṃqśU̍pasadA̍# carAma|tathA nO&surAḥ̍ pApmA nAnuvEthsyantIti̍|ta̍ upAṃqśU̍pasada̍-matanvata|tisra̍ Eva sAmidhEnIranUcya̍|42̍ (10)

sruvEṇAGAra-mAGArya̍|tisraḥ̍ parAcI-rAhu̍tIṛ̍ hutvA|sruvEṇOpasada̍M̍ juhavA~jcakruḥ|ugraM̍ ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEṣaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhEti|aśanayApipAsE̍ ha vA ugraM ~Mvacaḥ|Ena̍śca̍ vairahatyaM̍ ca tvEṣaM ~Mvacaḥ|Etaṃ̍ ha vAva taccaturddhAvihitaM̍ pApmAnaM̍ dEvA apajaGnirE||tathO̍# EvaitadEvaM̍ ~MvidyajamAnaḥ|tisra̍ Eva sAmidhEnIranUcya̍|sruvEṇA̍GAra-mAGArya̍|43̍ (10)

tisraḥ parAcIrAhu̍tIṛ̍ hutvA|sruvEṇOpasada̍M̍ juhOti|ugraM ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEṣaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhEti|aśanayApipAsE̍ ha vA ugraM ~Mvacaḥ|Ena̍śca̍ vairahatyaM̍ ca tvEṣaM ~Mvacaḥ|EtamEva̍ taccaturddhA-vihitaM̍ pApmAnaM ~MyajamAnO&pa̍hatE||tE̍&BinIyaivAha̍ḥ̍ paśumA-&laBanta|ahna̍# Eva tad-dEvA avartiM̍ pApmAnaM̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE|tEnA̍BinIyE̍va̍ rAtrEḥ prAcarann|rAtri̍yA̍ Eva tad-dEvA avartiM̍ pApmAnaM̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE||44̍ (10)

tasmAdaBinIyaivAha̍ḥ̍ paśumAlaBEta|ahna̍# Eva tad-yajamAnO̍ &vartiM̍ pApmAnaM BrAtRuvyAnapa̍nudatE|tEnA̍BinIyE̍va̍ rAtrEḥ pracarEt|rAtri̍yA̍ Eva tad-yajamAnO̍ &vartiM̍ pApmAnaM BrAtRuvyAnapa̍nudatE||sa̍ Eṣa upavasathIyE̍ &han-dvidEvatya̍ḥ̍ paśurAlaByatE|dvayaM̍ ~MvA asmin ~MlOkE yajamAnaḥ|asthi̍# ca mAṃqsaM ca|asthi̍# caiva tEna# mAṃqsaM ca yajamAnaḥ̍ saṅ skurutE||tA̍ vA EtAḥ pa~jca# dEvatA̱ḥ|agnIṣOmA-vagnir-mitrAvaru̍ṇau̍ ( )|45 (10)

pa~jcapa~jcI vai yajamAnaḥ|tva~gmAṃq̍ saṅ snAvAsthi# majjA|EtamEva tatpa~jcadhA̍ vihitamAtmAnaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAśAn-mu~jcati|BEṣajatA̍yai̍ nirvaruṇatvAya||taṃ̍ saptaBiḥ CandOBiḥ̍ prAtarahvayann|tasmA̱thsapta̍ caturuttarAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ prAtaranuvAkE&nU̱cyantE||tamEtayO-pasamEtyO-pA̍sIdann|upA̱smai̍ gAyatA nara iti|tasmA̍# dEtayA# bahiṣpavamAna upasadya̍ḥ||46̍ (9) (aicCan - nanayaṅq - stiṣṭhantE - &nUcyA - nUcya# sruvEṇAGAramAGArya̍ - rAtriyA̍ Eva tad dEvA avartiM̍ pApmAnaM# mRutyumapajaGnirE̍ - mitrAvaruṇau̍ - +nava# ca ) (A9) śpecial kOrvai (dEvA yajamAnO̍ dEvA dEvA yajamAnO̍ yajamAnO&laBanta̍ prAcara~MllaBEta̍ pracarEdAla̍BantAla̍BEta̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE̍ BrAtRuvyAn)̍ 1.5.10 anuvAkaM 10 - trivRudAdistOmarUpAṇi sOma~ggAni. (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

sa samudra̍ uttarataḥ̍ prAjvalad-BUmyantEna̍|Eṣa̍ vAva sa samudraḥ|yaccAtvA̍laḥ|Eṣa̍ u# vEva sa BU̱myantaḥ|yadvE̱dyantaḥ|tadEtat-triśalaM̍ tripUruṣam|tasmAt-taM̍ trivitastaM̍ Kananti||sa̍ suvarṇarajatAByA̱M̍ kuśIByAM parigRuhIta̍ AsIt|taM ~MyadasyA addhyajanayann|tasmA̍dAdityaḥ|47̍ (10)

atha yath suvarṇarajatAByA̱M̍ kuśIByAM parigRuhIta̍ AsI̱t|sA&sya# kauśikatA̱||taM trivRutA&Bi prAstuvata|taM̍ trivRutA &&dadata|taM̍ trivRutA &&harann|yAva̍tI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱||taM pa~jcadaśEnABi̍ prAstuvata|taM̍ pa~jcadaśEnAda̍data|taM̍ pa~jcadaśEnAha̍rann|yAva̍tI̍ pa~jcadaśasya mAtrA̱|48 (10)

taṃ saptadaśEnABi̍ prAstuvata|taṃ̍ saptadaśEnAda̍data|taṃ̍ saptadaśEnAha̍rann|yAva̍tI̍ saptadaśasya mAtrA̱|tasya# saptadaśEna# hriyamAṇasya̍ tEjO harO&patat|tamE̍kaviṃq̍ śEnABi prAstuvata|tamE̍kaviṃqśEnAda̍data|tamE̍kaviṃqśEnAha̍rann|yAva̍tyEkaviṃqśasya̍ mAtrA̱||tE yat-trivRutA̱ stuvatE̱|49 (10)

trivRutaiva tad-yajamAnamAda̍datE|taM̍ trivRutaiva haranti|yAva̍tI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱|agnirvai trivRut|yAvadvA agnErdahatO̍ dhUma udEtyAnuvyEti|tAva̍tI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱|agnErEvainaM tat|mAtrAṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti||atha yatpa~jcadaśEna̍# stuvatE̱|pa~jcadaśEnaiva tad-yajamAna-mAda̍datE|50̍ (10)

taM pa~jcadaśEnaiva̍ haranti|yAva̍tI̍ pa~jcadaśasya mAtrA̱|candramA vai pa~jcadaśaḥ|Eṣa̍ hi pa~jcadaśyAma̍pakṣIyatE̱|pa~jcadaśyA-mA̍pUryatE̱|candrama̍sa̍ EvainaM tat|mAtrAṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti|atha yathsaptadaśEna̍# stuvatE̱|saptadaśEnaiva tad-yajamAnamAda̍datE|taṃ̍ saptadaśEnaiva̍ haranti|51̍ (10)

yAvatI̍ saptadaśasya mAtrA̱|prajApatirvai̍ saptadaśaḥ|prajApa̍tErEvainaM̍ tat|mAtrAṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti|atha yadEkaviṃqśEna̍# stuvatE̱|EkaviṃqśEnaiva tad-yajamAna-mAda̍datE|tamE̍kaviṃqśEnaiva̍ haranti|yAva̍tyEkaviṃqśasya̍ mAtrA̱|asau vA Aditya̍ Ekaviṃqśaḥ|AdityasyaivainaM̍ tat|52 (10)

mAtrAṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti||tE kuśyau̱|vyaGnann|tE̍ ahOrAtrE̍ aBavatAm|aha̍rEva̍ suvarṇA# &Bavat|rajatA rAtriḥ|sa̍ yadAditya̍ udEti|EtAmEva̍ tathsuvarṇA̱M kuśImanu samEti|atha̍ yadastamEti̍|EtAmEva̍ tad-rajatAM̍ kuśImanu sam~Mviśati̍ ( )||prahrAdO# ha vai kAyAdhavaḥ|virOca̍naṅq̍ svaM putramudA̱syat|sa pradarO̍&Bavat|tasmA̱t̍ pradarAdudakaM̍ nAcAmEt||53̍ (14) 1.5.11 anuvAkaM 11 - savanIyapaśupurOḍAśAḥ (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

yE vai catvAraḥ stOmA̱ḥ|kRutaM tat|atha yE pa~jca|kaliḥ̍ saḥ|tasmAccatuṣṭOmaḥ|taccatu̍ṣṭOmasya̍ catuṣṭOmatvam||tadAhuḥ|katamAni̍ tAni jyOtIṃṣi|ya̍ Etasya stOmA iti|trivRut-pa̍~jcadaśaḥ̍ saptadaśa̍ Ekaviṃqśaḥ|54̍ (10)

EtAni vAva tAni jyOtIṃṣi|ya̍ Etasya stOmA̱ḥ||sO̱&bravIt|saptadaśEna# hriyamAṇO̍ vyalEśiṣi|Biṣajya̍ta̍ mEti|tamaśvinau̍# dhAnABi-raBiṣajyatAm|pUṣA̍ karamBEṇa̍|BAra̍tI̍ parivApEṇa|mitrAvaru̍ṇau̍ payasyayA||tadA̍huḥ|55̍ (10)

yadaśviByA̱M dhAnAḥ|pUṣṇaḥ karamBaḥ|BAra̍tyai̍ parivApaḥ|mitrAvaruṇayOḥ̍ payasyA&tha|kasmA̍dEtEṣAṃ̍# haviṣAmindramEva̍ yajantIti̍|EtA̍ hyEnaM̍ dEvatA iti# brUyAt|Etaiṛ havirBi-raBiṣajyaṅq-stasmAditi̍||taM̍ ~MvasavO&ṣṭAka̍pAlEna̍ prAtassavanE&Biṣajyann|rudrA̍ EkAdaśakapAlEna̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|viśvE̍# dEvA dvAdaśakapAlEna̍ tRutIyasavanE

sa yadaṣṭAkapAlAn̍ prAtassavanE kuryAt|EkAdaśakapAlAn̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|dvAda̍śakapAlAṅ̍ stRutIya savanE|vilOma̍ tad-yajñasya# kriyEta|EkAdaśakapAlAnEva̍ prAtassavanE̍ kuryAt|EkA̍daśakapAlAn̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|EkA̍daśakapAlAṅ̍ stRutIya savanE|yajñasya# salOmatvAya||tadA̍huḥ|yad̍ vasUnAM̍ prAtassavanam ( )|rudrAṇAM mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanam|viśvE̍ṣAM̍ dEvAnA̱M tRutIyasavanam|atha kasmAdEtEṣAṃ̍# haviṣAmindramEva̍ yajantIti̍|EtA̍ hyEnaM̍ dEvatA iti# brUyAt|Etaiṛ havirBiraBiṣajyaṅq̍ stasmAditi||57̍ (15) (Ekaviṃqśa-Ahu-stRutIyasavanE-prA̍tassavanaM̍ pa~jca# ca) (A11) 1.5.12 anuvAkaM 12 - saptaCandAMsi prapa~jcyantE (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

tasyAvAcO&vapAdAda̍biBayuḥ|tamEtEṣu̍# saptasu Candaḥ̍ svaśrayann|yadaśrayann|tacCrA̍yantIya̍sya̍ śrAyantIyatvam|yadavArayann|tad̍ vAravantIya̍sya̍ vAravantIyatvam||tasyAvAca̍ EvAvapAdAda̍biBayuḥ|tasmA̍# EtAni# sapta caturuttarAṇi̍ CandAṅqsyupAdadhuḥ|tEṣAmati̍ trIṇyaricyanta|na̍ trIṇyudaBavann|58̍ (10)

sa bRuhatImEvA-spRu̍śat|dvAByA̍makṣarA̱ByAm|ahOrAtrAByA̍mEva||tadA̍huḥ|katamA̍ sA dEvAkṣarA̍ bRuhatI|yasyAM tat pratyatiṣṭhat|dvAda̍śa̍ paurṇamAsyaḥ|dvAdaśAṣṭa̍kAḥ|dvAda̍śAmAvAsyA̱ḥ|EṣA̍ vAva sA dEvAkṣarA̍ bRuhatI|59 (10)

yasyAM tat pratyatiṣṭhaditi̍||yAni̍# ca CandAṅ-syatyari̍cyanta|yAni̍# ca nOdaBavann|tAni̍ nirvI̱ryAṇi hInAnyamanyanta|sA̍ &bravId-bRuhatI|mAmEva̍ BUtvA|mAmupa saṅ śrayatEti̍|caturBi̍rakṣarai̍-ranuṣṭug-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|caturBi̍rakṣarai̱ḥ̍ pa~gktir-bRuhatI-matya̍ricyata|tasyA̍mEtAni̍# catvAryakṣarA̱ṇya-pacCidyA-dadhAt|60̍ (10)

tE bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA|bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm||aṣṭABi-rakṣarai̍ruṣṇig-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|aṣṭABirakṣarai̱striṣṭug-bRu̍hatI-matya̍ricyata|tasyA̍mEtA-nyaṣṭAvakṣarA̱ṇya-pacCidyA̍dadhAt|tE̍ bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA|bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm|dvAdaśaBi̍-rakṣarai̱r-gAyatrI-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|dvAdaśaBi̍-rakṣarair-jaga̍tI-bRuhatI-matya̍ricyata|tasyA̍mEtAni̍ dvAdaśAkṣarA̱ṇya-pacCidyA̍dadhAt|61̍ (10)

tE bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA|bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm||sO̱&bravIt-prajApa̍tiḥ|CandAṃ̍si̍ rathO# mE Bavata|yuṣmABi-rahamEta-maddhvA̍namanu̍ saMcarAṇIti̍|tasya̍# gAyatrI ca jagatI̍ ca pakṣAvaBavatAm|uṣṇikca̍# triṣṭupca praṣṭyau̱|anuṣṭupca# pa~gktiśca dhuryau̱|bRuhatyEvOddhira̍Bavat|sa̍ EtaM CandOrathamAsthAya̍# ( )|EtamaddhvAnamanu̍ samacarat|Etaṃ̍ ha vai CandOrathamAsthAya̍|EtamaddhvA̍namanu̍ saMcarati|yEnaiṣa̍ Etath sacaMrati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAnth-sOmEna̍ yajatE|ya̍ ucainamEvaM̍ ~MvEda||62̍ (16) prapAtaka kOrvai with starting words of 1 tO 12 anuvAkams :- (agnEḥ kRuttikA̍ - yat puṇyaM̍ - dEvasya# savitur - brahmavAdinaḥ̍ ka - tyRutamEva - dEvA vA - Ayuṣaḥ̍ prAṇa - mindrO# dadhIcO -dEvAsurAḥ̍ sa prajApatiḥ̍ - sa samudrO̍ - yE vai catvAra - stasyAvAcO̍ dvAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting words of 1, 11, 21 series of dasinis :- (agnEḥ kRuttikA̍ - dEvagRuhA - RutamEva - vai̱śvadEvEna - tE tadanta̍ - taM pa~jcadaśEna̍ - tE bRuhatI̍ Eva dviṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ first and last word of 5th prapAtakam :- (agnEḥ kRuttikA̍ - ya u cainamEvaM̍ ~MvEda)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaṇE prathamAṣṭakE pa~jcamaḥ prapAṭhakaḥ samAptaḥ|APPEṇḍIX FOR 1.5.1.5

“pUrṇA-paścAd{1}”, “yattE# dEvA adadhuḥ{2}”̍ pUrṇA paścAduta pUrṇA purastAdunmadhyataḥ̍ pau̱rṇamAsI jigAya|tasyA̱n̍ dEvA adhi# saM~Mvasanta̍ uttamE nAka# iha mAdayantAM||yattE̍# dEvA adadhu̍ rBAgadhEyamamAvAsyE̍ saM~MvasantO̍ mahitvA|sAnO# yajñaM pipRuhi̍ viśvavArE rayiM nO# dhEhi suBagE suvIra̱M||(Appearing in ṭś 3.5.1.1) =================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ śrI guruByO namaḥ, hariḥ OM 1.6 prathamAṣṭakE ṣaṣṭhaḥ prapAṭhakaḥ - rAjasUyAnubrAhmaṇaM 1.6.1 anuvAkaM 1 - anumatyAdyA iṣṭayaḥ

anumatyai̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati|yE̍ pratya~jcaḥ śamyAyA̍ avaśIyantE|tannaiṛ̍Ruta-mEka̍kapAlam|iyaM̍ ~MvA anumatiḥ|iyaM̍ niṛRutiḥ|naiṛqRutEna̍ pUrvEṇa̍ pracarati|pApmAna̍mEva̍ niṛRutiM̍ pUrvA̱M niravadayatE|Eka̍# kapAlO Bavati|Ekadhaiva niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE|yadahu̍tvA̍ gAṛhapatya̍ Iyuḥ|1 (10)

rudrO BUtvA&gniranUtthAya̍|addhvaryuM̍ ca yajamAnaM̍ ca hanyAt|vIhi svAhA &&hutiM̍ juṣAṇa ityAha|Ahu̍tyaivainaṃ̍# śamayati|nArtimArcCa-tyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnaḥ|EkOlmukEna̍# yanti|taddhi niṛRutyai̍ BAgadhEya̱m|imAM diśaM̍ ~Myanti|EṣA vai niṛRutyai̍ dik|svAyAmEva̍ diśi niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE|2̍ (10)

svakRuta̍ iriṇE̍ juhOti pradarE vA̱|Etadvai niṛRutyA̍ Ayatanam|sva̍ EvAyatanE̍ niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE|Eṣa̍ tE# niṛRutE BAga ityAha|nirdi̍śatyEvainA̱m|BUtE̍# haviṣmatyasItyA̍ha|BUti̍mEvOpAva̍rtatE|mu~jcEmamaṃha̍sa̍ ityAha|aṃha̍sa̍ EvainaM̍ mu~jcati|a~gguṣṭhAByA̱M juhOti|3 (10)

antata Eva niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE|kRuṣṇaM̍ ~MvAsaḥ̍ kRuṣṇatUṣaM̍ dakṣiṇA|Etad-vai̍ niṛRutyai̍ rUpam|rUpEṇaiva niṛRutiM̍ niravadayatE|apra̍tIkṣamAya̍nti|niṛRu̍tyA̍ antaṛhityai|svAhA̍ namO ya idaM cakArEti punarEtya gAṛhapatyE̍ juhOti|Ahutyaiva̍ namasyantO̍ gAṛhapatya-mupAva̍rtantE|AnumatEna̍ pracarati|iyaM̍ ~MvA anumatiḥ|4̍ (10)

iyamEvAsmai# rAjyamanumanyatE|dhEnur-dakṣi̍ṇA|imAmEva̍ dhEnuM kurutE|AdityaM̍ caruM nirvapati|uBayI̱ṣvEva̍ prajAsvaBiṣicyatE|daivI̍ṣu̍ ca mAnuṣIṣu̍ ca|varO dakṣiṇA|varO̍ hi rAjyaṃ samRuddhyai|AgnAvaiṣṇava-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|agniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA̱ḥ|5 (10)

viṣṇuryajñaḥ|dEvatA̱ścaiva̍ yajñaM cAva# rundhE|vAmanO vahI dakṣiṇA|yad-vahI|tEnA̱gnEyaḥ|yad-vA̍manaḥ|tEna̍# vaiṣṇavaḥ samRuddhyai|agnIṣOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|agnIṣOmA̱ByAM̍ ~MvA indrO# vRutramahanniti̍|yada̍gnIṣOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|6̍ (10)
